title: Private Web Site Works In SafeMode, But Not With All Extensions Turned Off
content:
Firefox 112 Mint Linux

The web site for my VOIP company lets me set phone numbers as "contacts" via a web form.

I started getting an error message along the lines of "Error Adding Contacts".

I restarted Firefox in --safe-mode, the site worked.

I restarted Firefox in normal mode. I then turned off each extension, one by one, refreshing the form. I ended up turning them all off and the contact form stayed broken.

What else does --safe-mode turn off besides the extensions?

Thanks.

title: Copying from webpage
content:
I have a desktop PC.

A webpage contains 1,000 rows (not including pictures/images).

I do Cntl+A or drag the cursor from the first line to the last line.

All rows are highlighted.

I then do Cntl+C to copy all rows.

When I paste the rows into an empty Excel spreadsheet or into an empty text file, only 66 rows are pasted.

What am I doing wrong?

title: Firefox Crashes on Mac - Not Opening
content:
Hello all,

I had some issues with my Firefox late this afternoon not wanting to scroll up or down but it still loaded pages and switched tabs without problems.

I gave the mac a reboot and thereafter Firefox refused to open. I tried uninstalling and reinstalling, cleared everything via Terminal commands, and even used Brew to uninstall the package. I have a wealth of information on my Firefox account and it's my browser of choice but I cannot open it.

When I reinstall, I get passed the 'verifying' message, which asks me if I still want to open the application downloaded from another browser. I click 'open' and nothing.

When I go to Applications and click on Firefox, it briefly appears in the dock and then closes itself again. No error messages, nothing. The best assistance that I've found is 'to create a new profile' but how do you do that if the app doesn't even open?

Please help, I need this browser to continue with my work and personal life, I can't go far without it.
creator: ferrari.snyman

title: Is there a way to retrieve delted bookmarks?
content: I recently turned on an old computer that I hadn't used in a while which had Firefox on it and was still logged in to my Mozilla account (but it was locked out of the account and needed me to manually log in again to access all the features). Before I did so I wanted to clear the old bookmarks on my old computer's Firefox so these wouldn't get added to my Mozilla account when I synchronized it, so I deleted them thinking only the bookmarks on my old computer's old Firefox would be deleted. But when I went on my laptop's Firefox to synchronize and make sure my Mozilla account was up to date all of my bookmarks were gone on this device as well, and now I can't seem to get them back - is there any way to retrieve these just deleted bookmarks? They took years to add, from many websites that I don't know the names of, and upon which I completely relied on the bookmarks to use.

title: selainongelma
content:
Miksi mozilla firefoxissa on alkanut nyt 2 viikon sisällä ilmaantua verkkopankkiin kirjautumisen JÄLKEEN, siis jo kun ollaan verkkopankissa sisällä, ilmoitus, että tähän verkkoon täytyy kirjautua ennen internetin käyttämistä ja harmaa nappi, että avaa verkon kirjautumissivu. Jos sen klikkaa auki, niin tulee f-securen ilmoitus, että F-secure on estänyt sivun http://detectportal.firefox.com/canonical.html. Miksi sieltä yrittää hyökätä pankki-istunnon aikaan tuommoinen sivu?? Ei tarvitsisi hyökätä mitään pankki-istunnon aikana. Tämä tulee siis pankkiin kirjautumisen jälkeen, jo kun ollaan kirjauduttu verkkopankkiin sisälle.

Kyseessä on siis kotikoneella OMALLA mokkulalla kirjautuminen, ei mikään julkinen verkko, ja olen jo sisällä verkkopankissa. Tämä ilmiö on tullut 2 viikon sisällä, eilen vastaavasta ilmoitti veljeni, joka kirjautuu kotonaan jakamalla kännykästään usb-piuhalla yhteyden. Olen käyttänyt moxilla firefoxia n 15-20vuotta, enkä ole vastaavaan törmännyt. F-securelta kysyin, ja kyseessä ei ilm. ole haittaohjelma, vaan joku firefoxin ominaisuus. Miski se on ilmaantunut nyt 2 viikona aikana. Miten sen saa pois? Häisitsee , kun verkkopankkiin kirjaaantumisen jälkeen sivulle ilmaantuu outo ehdottelu ja nappi, josta voi availla availla jonku kirjaantumissivun... Olen luullut firefoxia turvalliseksi, vaan nyt taidan vaihtaa selaimeksi chromen.

title: Firefox V112 (64 bit) slow to load pages
content:
Hi all. Permit me to say thank you in advance to the people responding.

I am running a late 2010 MacBook Air, Firefox V 112 (64 bit), IOS 10.13.6. Search Engine is Duck Duck Go. Web pages have become very slow to load. Lower left hand part of the screen displays "waiting for Duck Duck Go, waiting for YouTube, etc." I have the same problem with a like vintage Lenovo V460 running Windows 10. It's not the router because my smartphone loads pages wicked fast and it uses my router for data. The phone is using Firefox Focus.

Changing the browser to Safari speeds loading. Changing the browser to Edge does the same for the Lenovo V460.

This problem began with both computers after Firefox recent updates, although I don't recall when it started. Suggestions? I have been a Firefox user since forever ago and I'd really like to keep using it.

Thanks again.

Allen.
creator: Allendotgreen

title: Intermittent loss of video quality while watching Spectrum TV.
content:
Using Firefox 112.0 on a Win 10 64bit HP Omen running an Nvidia GTX 1070 and 32GB ram onboard. When I go to watch tv in my office through https://watch.spectrum.net/livetv, the resolution will randomly just drop out to an unwatchable blurred mess. It may do it right off the bat when I open the link, or it may drop out minutes, or even hours into it. Bandwidth is not an issue, as I'm running WIFI 6 on the 5Ghz channel pulling an average Speedtest result of 220Mbps, with a ping of 12ms. Upload is an asymmetric ~12Mbps, but that's a moot point, I feel. There are no issues with YT, or watching Twitch. Running Firefox 112, Edge, Brave, and Chrome side by side to compare picture quality, surprisingly Firefox presents the clearest, sharpest video when it is rendering properly, which makes this a bit more frustrating. This loss of quality occurs to a lesser degree and frequency in Edge and Chrome, but I've yet to see it in Brave. So that leads me to think it might be a GPU setting. I've tried increasing several of the 'about:config' media.cache, browser.cache settings, disabled the browser.cache.disk.size.smart_enable, to no avail. I factory reset the Tp-Link Ac-1900, enabled/disabled all ALG protocols, switched between 20/40/80Mghz, adjusted RTS threshold everywhere between 500 to 2346. Enabled/disabled IGMP snooping. I also toggled/adjusted several of the MFAA, FXAA, anisotropic, shader cache size, etc within the Nvidia control panel. I feel I have a gremlin under the hood. Thank you for any suggestions or ideas! I love troubleshooting, but I'm gonna have to call in reinforcements on this one!

title: Scroll
content: Nem tudom görgetni az oldalakat az egérrel. Más böngészőknél működik a görgő, a Firefox-nál nem. Köszönöm a fáradságot! Üdv; Egyed Péter :)
creator: egyedpeter
